info.name: SendMe Logistics - Complete API Collection
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for SendMe Logistics platform covering all 8 models with complete CRUD operations and model-specific functionality

body.raw:
{
    "bookingId": "{{bookingId}}",
    "revieweeId": "{{userId}}",
    "reviewType": "customer_to_driver",
    "rating": 5,
    "review": "Excellent service! The driver was punctual and professional.",
    "detailedRatings": {
        "punctuality": 5,
        "communication": 5,
        "professionalism": 5,
        "carHandling": 5,
        "packageCondition": 5
    },
    "tags": ["excellent_service", "on_time", "professional", "friendly"]
}

{ "title": "How to Book a Delivery", "type": "page", "language": "en", "slug": "how-to-book-delivery", "content": { "html": "

How to Book a Delivery

Follow these simple steps to book your delivery...

", "text": "How to Book a Delivery\n\nFollow these simple steps to book your delivery...", "markdown": "# How to Book a Delivery\n\nFollow these simple steps to book your delivery..." }, "excerpt": "Learn how to book a delivery with our step-by-step guide", "metaTitle": "How to Book a Delivery - SendMe Logistics", "metaDescription": "Step-by-step guide on how to book a delivery with SendMe Logistics", "category": "help", "tags": ["booking", "delivery", "guide", "help"], "status": "published", "visibility": "public", "featuredImage": "https://example.com/images/booking-guide.jpg" }

{
    "subject": "Issue with my booking",
    "description": "I'm having trouble with my recent booking. The driver hasn't arrived and I can't track the package.",
    "category": "booking_issue",
    "subcategory": "driver_not_found",
    "priority": "high",
    "urgency": "high",
    "relatedBooking": "{{bookingId}}",
    "contactInfo": {
        "name": "John Doe",
        "email": "john.doe@example.com",
        "phone": "+447123456789",
        "preferredContactMethod": "email"
    },
    "tags": ["urgent", "booking", "driver"]
}
